pullRequest.title: Adding Task State to RunningSplitInfo
pullRequest.bodyText:
== NO RELEASE NOTE ==

It was observed that there was a long running split
after the query was abandoned/cancelled. Adding the
task state info to do better troubleshooting.
The new output of "/v1/maxActiveSplits" looks like:
6 splits have been continuously active for more than 600.00s seconds
"20200603_191419_00288_79sup.3.0.220-18" tid=103 status=running
at java.base@10/java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method)
at java.base@10/java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead(SocketInputStream.java:116)
at java.base@10/java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:171)
at java.base@10/java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:141)
at java.base@10/java.io.DataInputStream.readFully(DataInputStream.java:200)
at java.base@10/java.io.DataInputStream.readFully(DataInputStream.java:170)
